revised_title: Observation of a Lunar Eclipse in 1749
tldr: This article describes a detailed observation of a lunar eclipse on December 12, 1749, by Mr. Wm. Elstobb. The author provides a step-by-step account of the eclipse, noting the time of the umbra and penumbra, the affected lunar features, and the shape of the umbra's edge. The observation contributes to the understanding of lunar eclipses and their effects on the Moon's surface.
